General.Name: Korea Information Engineering Services Co. Ltd
General.Description: Korea Information Engineering Services Co., Ltd. provides IT solutions in South Korea. It offers AI-based chatbot solutions and online shopping mall analysis services; RollBook, a location-based solution that provides attendance management function in universities and academics, and real-time workflow and facility management solutions; and LBS business management mobile and enterprise resource planning (ERP) system for IT distribution company solutions. The company also supplies PCs/notebooks; and servers/storage products. Korea Information Engineering Services Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: 7, Hwangsaeul- ro 359 beon-gil, Seongnam-si, South Korea
